channel.title: SquirrellyJS Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest SquirrellyJS news and events.

item.title: Introducing Squirrelly
item.description:
Today, I'm proud to introduce Squirrelly, the best template engine around!

Here's a list of fully implemented features:

  1. If statements (with else)
  2. Looping through arrays
  3. Looping through objects
  4. Helper variables
  5. Filters (on just global
